# Sharethrough

## Example

### Basic

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="450"
  layout="responsive"
  type="sharethrough"
  data-pkey="c0fa8367"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For semantics of configuration, please [contact Sharethrough](mailto:pubsupport@sharethrough.com).

### Required parameters

-   `data-pkey`: (String, non-empty) The unique identifier for your placement
